party.name: PARISH OF ST. JAMES, STATE OF LOUISIANA

offerAndAcceptance.offer: Lease Agreement dated as of July 1, 2010
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: Execution of the Second Supplemental Lease Agreement as of July 15, 2024
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Amendment of the Original Agreement with consent of affected parties

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: This Second Supplemental Lease Agreement is made and entered into to formalize the agreement between the parties outlined.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: Purpose of the Lease Agreement complies with laws of the State of Louisiana.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: Lease of an additional storage capacity at the NuStar St. James Terminal
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: The agreement becomes effective on July 15, 2024.

contract.consent: Consents for the amendment of the Original Agreement were obtained from the Trustee and the Issuer.
contract.formAndFormalities: This amendment is executed to comply with required legal formalities.

durationAndTermination.duration: Indeterminate, based on the terms outlined in the Original Agreement.
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Default provisions as specified in the Original Agreement.
durationAndTermination.renewalTerms: Renewable under the same terms as the original unless amended.

contract.representationsAndWarranties: A confirmation of representations and warranties of the Issuer and Company as per the Original Agreement.

disputeResolution.details: Any disputes are addressed in accordance with applicable law.

governingLawAndJurisdiction.jurisdiction: Any dispute arising under this agreement shall be governed by the laws of Louisiana.

contract.severability: If any provision of this agreement is determined to be illegal or unenforceable, the remaining provisions remain in effect.

signature.partyName: PARISH OF ST. JAMES, STATE OF LOUISIANA

signature.declaration: By Dylan A. Bramhall, Chief Financial Officer
